description:
Water Color Sort: Puzzle Game – is a brand new color sorting puzzle game with a breakthrough in gameplay and sorting puzzles. Show your skills in sortpuz and pouring watercolors into the bottles, test tubes, glasses, soda bottles so that each container is filled up with the same color. If you love to play color sorting games and puzzle games or color pouring games, then this water color sorting game is the best choice for you. How to Play Color Sorting Game:

• This color sorting game can be played using only one finger.
• Tap the glass bottle and pour watercolor into another bottle.
• You can only pour water color into another bottle if it has the same color and enough space. 
• If you get stuck, no worries, you can Restart the level at any time
• Use the hint option to get the additional move.
